attributes.action: close the Defence Exports Services Organisation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is an organisation, part of the Ministry of Defence, which exists to help promote British arms exporters

If the government priorities are to reduce the damage internationally that arms can do, why promote them? (and subsidize this organisation to do so, to the tune of £17 million for 2004/2005)
